io.atomix.copycat.client

Interface RetryStrategy.Attempt

  • Enclosing interface:
    RetryStrategy

    public static interface RetryStrategy.Attempt
    Represents a single attempt to submit an operation to the Copycat cluster.

    For each operation submission attempt, an Attempt object will be provided to the RetryStrategy upon failure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attempt()
      Returns the attempt count.
      void fail()
      Fails the operation.
      void fail(Throwable t)
      Fails the operation with a specific exception.
      Operation<?> operation()
      Returns the operation was attempted and failed.
      void retry()
      Immediately retries the operation.
      void retry(Duration after)
      Retries the operation after the given duration.

    • Method Detail

      • attempt

        int attempt()
        Returns the attempt count.

        The attempt count is representative of the number of submission attempts have been made prior to the failure of this attempt. For the first RetryStrategy.Attempt for any given submitted operation, the attempt count will be 1 and will increase for each retry of an attempt.

        Returns:
        The submission attempt count.

      • operation

        Operation<?> operation()
        Returns the operation was attempted and failed.

        The attempt operation is the Command or Query that was submitted by the user to the client.

        Returns:
        The attempted operation.

      • fail

        void fail()
        Fails the operation.

        When the operation is failed with no user-provided exception, the associated CompletableFuture will be completed exceptionally with either a CommandException or QueryException based on the type of the attempted operation.

      • fail

        void fail(Throwable t)
        Fails the operation with a specific exception.

        When the operation is failed, the associated CompletableFuture will be completed exceptionally with the provided exception.

        Parameters:
        t - The exception with which to fail the operation.

      • retry

        void retry()
        Immediately retries the operation.

        The operation will immediately be resubmitted to the cluster via the client's current Session. If the client is in the SUSPENDED state, the operation may be enqueued to be resubmitted once the client reestablishes communication with the cluster. In the event that the client transitions between the CopycatClient.State.SUSPENDED and CopycatClient.State.CONNECTED states, the operation may be resubmitted under a new session.

      • retry

        void retry(Duration after)
        Retries the operation after the given duration.

        The operation will be resubmitted to the cluster after the given duration has expired. Note that even if operations are resubmitted after different durations, all operations will be completed in the order in which they were submitted by the user. Reordering operations via attempt retries will not negatively impact the order of results.

        If the client is in the SUSPENDED state once the given Duration expires, the operation may be enqueued to be resubmitted once the client reestablishes communication with the cluster. In the event that the client transitions between the CopycatClient.State.SUSPENDED and CopycatClient.State.CONNECTED states, the operation may be resubmitted under a new session.

        Parameters:
        after - The duration after which to retry the operation.
